text: Ana ndia ana ndava mbɨv ana nzuaim, ana won ndia ŋgarkarav khaŋ ana nzuai, ‘Ndu na mbarara! Gu kha mparir gu fhura ndun ŋaara guma ga gegap, ndun ŋgarav ki. Gu ndu nzuai buna thueŋ, gu ne kaadogi fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Gu fhum ndu phorga ki. Gu fhum ndu phorga kim, ndu maaŋ muuŋgiap na nzuav meme thaneŋra shogim, gu won kɨvntogir kov pav ndikndigi fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara!
